attributes.action: Stop using the natural phenomenon of climate change as an excuse to raise taxes, when there is no scientific proof that it is man's actions that are causing it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We implore the government to stop using climate change as an excuse to introduce taxes, when it has been scientifically proven that carbon dioxide is an indicator of global warming, NOT the other way round as spun by environmentalists.  Global warming and cooling is a natural phenomenon that man cannot affect or stop.  If we are to do anything, then we must PREPARE for climate change - not try to stop it.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop using the natural phenomenon of climate change as an excuse to raise taxes, when there is no scientific proof that it is man's actions that are causing it."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14940.asp

Prime Minister's Office
